ygData.subject: Re: Another Question....
ygData.msgSnippet: The only time I have heard anything even similar is in a raid situation where participants should go LFG so that they can be placed in groups within the raid.
ygData.messageBody:
The only time I have heard anything even similar is in a raid
situation where participants should go LFG so that they can be
placed in groups within the raid. If you are in a zone with a raid
gathering, it might be related to that. Since there are normally
lots of people in a small area, it might be hard to catch everyone.
Usually people just say "is there anyone still looking for a group"
but I can see the "looking for group check" thing too...

--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "bubi_g_67" <bubi_g_67@y...> wrote:
> This might be a silly question for those of you who are experts at
> playing Everquest, but, I still have to ask it. What does it mean
> when a person shouts "looking for group check"? I've been playing
> for just over a year and have never quite figured out if this
means
> that the person is looking for new group members or if they are
> acoounting for the members that are already in the group. Just a
> question from someone who simply does not know.
>
> Thanks
